website_summaries.verdict: A mix of easy to wear matte and shimmer shades at a price your wallet will love.
pros: Available in 3 color schemes: Nudes, Goldens, and Jewels
8-pan palette sits at a considerably low price point
Goes on light, but is easily buildable to create a range of subtle to dramatic looks
Shimmer and matte shades have almost no fallout
cons: You will need primer and setting spray to help this shadow last all day

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: As much as I didn't want this to be a knock off, it is. I read other comments that it wasn't authentic, so when I received the pallet I did some research. I went to the covergirl website. First, it does not contain the cruelty free trade mark. Second, the colors are not the same as the authentic pallet. Other than that the packaging looks authentic. The colors in this pallet are beautiful. You do receive two pallets. Although it's not authentic, for the money it is a descent pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Love this palette!
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette! I purchased this palette before and repurchased it again because I love it so much. I’m not big on the darker colors, but recently someone did my makeup for a wedding and the used several of the colors in the palette, Includinf the darker shades and my eye makeup looked amazing. I don’t have a problem with it coming off during the day. I did wear a cream eyeshadow base to the wedding, but I don’t do that for daily use and my shadows stays on. I definitely recommend this palette. It is a great price! I have celiac and this has not irritated my eyes like many shadows have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pigmented shadows that blended great. Love Covergirl.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my Covergirl Sunsets Palette today and where it was well packaged, when I opened it the palette was broken. I immediately contacted customer service and Amazon immediately resolved the situation and let me keep the palette but refunded me the full money for the palette because it was broken. They have wonderful customer service. I cleaned the palette up and it is beautiful. I used it today and the colors are very pigmented, beautiful and blended well. The eyeshadow colors had no fall out and looked great when applied. So pretty on the eyes. I love all Covergirl.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: More purple-y than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are pretty but more purple (not really pinkish/rosey) than I was expecting. The lighter colors are very light pastel, and the darker colors are very bold. With my very fair skin, I probably won't use the darker colors at all. Most shades have glitter or shimmer to them. The consistency is very powdery. The box was reinforced with bubble wrap, which prevented damage. Still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: The color payoff isn’t great: the light colors need to be built up a lot, using a lot of product and the three darker colors all look about the same nearly black shade and it doesn’t blend well with the lighter shades. I’m not sure my palette is exactly the same shades as the one advertised... mine looks overall darker and more “orchid” than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Calex

customer_reviews.title: May have been a used product
customer_reviews.text: The eyeshadow looked like it had possibly been a product someone had returned and then it was purchased and resold to me, the customer. The reason I say this is because it looked like it had been swiped through on some of the colors. I just thought that was kind of odd. I did go ahead and use it since I didn’t know for sure and the colors are pretty. I will say I probably won’t get it again because I don’t to pay for a possible used product.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn R

customer_reviews.title: Nice shades, but not as long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Roses and the Smoky versions. I have blue-green eyes and found the Smoky to be too intense for my eye color and fair, neutral-cool complexion. The Roses version is beautiful for my eye color and skin tone, but I've taken off one star because the wear does not last as long as other drug store eyeshadow brands.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sparkling goodness!
customer_reviews.text: If you are into the pinks then this palette is for you! Sweet sparkly goodness here! They stay on a long time. No fall out. At a great price! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: paramour

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but mostly frosted colors.
customer_reviews.text: Too many frosted colours for me to be truly useful. The shade selection is very pretty, very basic neutrals. If only they were matte, I would give them 5 stars. They don't have the staying power you might want, but the price is great. I received 2 boxes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Georgeous Palette
customer_reviews.text: Love Cover Girl products and this one doesn't disappoint either. Palette is very pretty, the powder goes on buttery smooth and the pigment is rich. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: I love every shade of this pallet
customer_reviews.text: I love every shade of this pallet. However, the powder doesn't stay compacted - I only moved it from the bathroom to my dresser a couple of times and have never dropped it and two of the pans are full of loose powder. They're still usable and have great pigment, it's my go-to pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these colors! Theyre perfect for a light skinned woman. Easy to make a very pretty smokey eye for a green eyed woman.
customer_reviews.author: Abby P

customer_reviews.title: Stunning eye palette!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this eye palette! I buy the nude one, and its beautiful! I love the colors. They are neutral shades that are great for an all day, natural look. This is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: These colors are so beautiful. I’m really upset that when mine arrived they were broken. I’ll just stick to purchasing eyeshadows from the store!!
customer_reviews.author: Haleyjean

customer_reviews.title: Pigmentation isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: The colors are gorgeous- a great combination. However they aren’t as pigmented as I had expected. Even using a base it doesn’t stay on long. I definitely expected more from this palette.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: Like the old blushed wine colirs
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this palette. I used to wear an older color palette called blushed wines which discontinued. Really enjoy this as a substitute- there are more colors and they compliment each other very well. I have hazel colored eyes and these work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bring on some color finally!!
customer_reviews.text: Very vivid colors that need knowledge of blending techniques. But I love strong colors - bored with just using the nude colors and smoky eye effects. I'm definitely wanting more color in my eyeshadow wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Colors blend beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Colors are smooth & creamy. Blend beautifully. Really happy with my purchase! I chose Covergirl for their confirmation that they do not test on animals & I am extremely satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this neutral palette. I have allergies so I usually only use a certain product. I tried this one and I am fine. The range if colors is great and it goes on easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Brucker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the colors as suitable for my fair skin and green eyes. Product doesn't smudge and blends well. I was a bit concerned about the frost colors being too sparkly. Just the right amount. Great with Cover Girl Queen jumbo lip gloss balm colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Not a good pallet at all. Tons of fallout. Doesn’t blend. No pigment. Nothing good about it.
customer_reviews.author: kao1124

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rainbow colors,  minimal fall out
customer_reviews.text: I love this, the cookies are beautiful, theres pay off without too much effort, and there isn't ridiculous amounts of fall out, however if you want a neutral shade other than gray to compliment that rainbow eye look you'll need a different palette because this only incudes a slightly shimmery dark gray shade as a neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Great color palette!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about purchasing this eyeshadow palette but have been very pleased with purchase.. love the colors. Goes on flawless.
customer_reviews.author: H.L

customer_reviews.title: Similar to another product
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. My only problem is that this is basically all the same shades in an ELF eyeshadow pallet I already have.
customer_reviews.author: CherylTegan

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I love using pink and purple eyeshadow shades on a daily basis, so this palette is perfect for me. This is definitely better for every day where and not intense makeup. It does have a few nighttime looks, but nothing for super dramatic looking makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect EyeShadow palette
customer_reviews.text: I love every single color. The shadow is silky and has a good color payoff. Perfect if you like a clean, classy, neutral look like Bobbi Brown or Trish McEvoy but at a much better price point.
customer_reviews.author: Glomaster General

customer_reviews.title: Colors Complement each other nicely
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors. They work out perfect for my blue eyes and brown hair. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with bigger items broke it
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors Hate that it was shipped with big items and was broken when I opened delivery
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Should have paid attention to ounces...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a pretty good deal but should have paid better attention to the listed ounces. Item arrived much smaller than anticipated and you are really not getting as much product as the picture depicted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garehime

customer_reviews.title: Love this Shadow!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly the colors I was looking for to use for summer. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ward

customer_reviews.title: great quality product great colors
customer_reviews.text: all the way around every color amazing, wear well stays on well goes on well and blends well
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catalano

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PALATE!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great quality, easy to use and a very clean design that is ideal for travel etc.
customer_reviews.author: RICK SANDERS

customer_reviews.title: Smokey eyes done right !
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors in this compact. They are richly pigmented and flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors! It goes on nice and smooth. It stayed on during high humidity and didn't smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors, but the shadow itself is crumbly.
customer_reviews.author: kllety

customer_reviews.title: Love this shadow.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this shadow palette (Rose shades) and I love the rich texture of the powder. Glides on very smoothly with great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: L D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shades and textire
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and easy to blend. Really good for beginners also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Like these not a fan of the darker ones to dark I think but they blend ok
customer_reviews.author: Amaz00n

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great pigment at a price real people can afford. Love this! I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jess G

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it arrived with 2 of the colors all cracked up and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Wedoidos

customer_reviews.title: Really like these!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this palette. The lightest color works as kind of a powder highlighter for me, and all the other ones work great as eyeshadows. I’m also really impressed; I applied some right before taking a shower, and it’s still in place! All in all, a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing colors
customer_reviews.text: Day makeup to date night makeup. This kit covers it all
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K

customer_reviews.title: New favorite pallette
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite pallette! 4 colors are matte and 4 are sparkly/iridescent. The sparkly ones are the most pigmented in my experience, but all colors work great. I definitely recommend buying this pallette.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Giuliani

customer_reviews.title: love love the colors but it's extremely delicate and a ...
customer_reviews.text: love love the colors but it's extremely delicate and a few of them have already crumbled together or fallen out completely
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: These eye shadows are perfect. The pigment is awesome and rhey all blend very well. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It's really good.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was really good. The palette came in good shape. The product is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: This arrived covered in eyeshadow. I opened the unsealed palette to find a broken eyeshadow. Oddly the second half of the broken color was not in the compact.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Get in style with the “smoky eye” look!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for creating todays popular “smoky eye” look...easy to do and great looking!
customer_reviews.author: beachy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Colors didn't really show up on me. Especially the matte shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product.
customer_reviews.text: Came in completely broken. The glitter dust got all over.
customer_reviews.author: deima

customer_reviews.title: Does not travel well
customer_reviews.text: It was very odd that I received two pallets in my package and only paid for one. I thought “bonus!” Until I realized one of the packages was completely destroyed. Why bother sending it in the first place?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I received a knock off. The colors don’t match the pictures from their official website and the picture show on this Amazon page. Be careful when buying makeup from third parties on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette so much. Creamy, blendable and the colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwyrm1025

customer_reviews.title: Bad application stick
customer_reviews.text: I lowered my score on value because I have had 2 or 3 of these and the end of the application stick comes off. It is very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another good find here at amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are perfect. Just what I was looking for to add to my collection of eye shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Debra s smith

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice addition to my evening makeup options. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shades
customer_reviews.text: I bought this palette to go on a two week vacation. I wanted to limit the make items that would be traveling with me. This palette fit the bill. Soft natural look for daytime. Smoky glam for evening!
customer_reviews.author: LIKES BARGAINS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful makeup
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great and the texture of the eyeshadow is exceptional as well. Loved this! Cover girls new eyeshadows are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Heft

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product- I’ve used twice and the powder is all broken up and making a mess already!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great shades!Shadow goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: Great mauve and pinks shades of eyeshadows. I use them every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The palette is beautiful, but the eyeshadow was broken up. I didn't send it back because it can be such a hassle. I will fix it the best I can and use what I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: I thought that they would all be matte, but they're not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors were not as they appear in picture
customer_reviews.text: The product i received, the colors were much darker than expected. Looks gummy too. I'll try it but doesn't look promising.
customer_reviews.author: Eviek

customer_reviews.title: Came in crumbles
customer_reviews.text: My eyeshadow was in pieces. Had waited so long for it to come, did what I could to salvage what I could. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these colors!! Now, to just learn how to apply eye shadow properly..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super good colors. don't stay on Great but worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydeekay

customer_reviews.title: Love this product so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much! Don't have a Target close by, so Amazon is the next best bet for purchasing this product. Great shades of makeup for a casual coffee day, or a night in the city (or a basic movie night).
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Love the Colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and great for summer makeup for blonde hair and green eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Broken and open
customer_reviews.text: The safety seal was open and it broke apart in the box. The eye shadow was all over all the other thing in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Mihaly

customer_reviews.title: No pigment
customer_reviews.text: Barely shows up and I’m super pale so that’s a problem
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Buker

customer_reviews.title: Loved the soft velvety feel & true colour when applied ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the soft velvety feel & true colour when applied over a lid primer. The Matt shades are beautiful & a great match for hooded eyes of an older woman. Yet to try the shimmers as they can age your lids due to crinkling of older skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good colors but that’s about it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors but it doesn’t wear very well after a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love the Colors
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She was very happy to receive this palette of eye shadows and stated that they are the exact colors she loves to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Swindle

customer_reviews.title: Great Palette
customer_reviews.text: Shadows are beautiful. I love that CoverGirl is releasing larger palettes. It is the perfect size for travel. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item received not genuine
customer_reviews.text: The palette I received is not the same as shown in the item description - as you can see by my picture, the colors do not match. It does not appear to be a genuine product. I am returning this as a result, and will not make the mistake of buying it online again.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Singa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the palette but I feel as if it was too expensive. Too faced is better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Darker Colors Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: All the pewter/grays are darker in application than they look in the pan. To get a light shimmery gray/silver on my lid for a smokey eye, I have to combine the lightest pewter/gray with one of the highlighter colors.
customer_reviews.author: emory2001

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeshadow, the colors are so pretty. I get a lot of compliments on my eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Joey & Vannessa

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive and horrible pigment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wear these colors a lot.First of all it is more than double the price of what you would spend at the store. Second, the colors barely show, I have to reapply several times just so it shows up on my eye lids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this make up it broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J Cotta

customer_reviews.title: Never again....ggggrrrrrr
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever received from Amazon. I order from them every few months. I live in a rural area so its very handy. I received this product in very bad shape. Two of the colors were broken a d were floating around in the box. Then the outside of the box was dirty and scratched up.... I look and the safety seal was broke. I love cover girl products.....but I threw this in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors... except mine came in completely destroyed. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive substitute for urban decay naked. But there more shimmer in this.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your makeup toolbox
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on the Today show and I had to give it a try. This is my new go to pallette for Nudes. I love all the shades!!!! I own higher end eyeshadows but these are on par. They go on smooth and stay on. This is a deal for this set with the right colors to get that smoky. I wear these almost everyday for that natural look. Highly recommend to have in your makeup toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Just as Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this eye shadow pallet before reading reviews, but after the reviews I was super nervous that I was going to get a broken or used product. I was very happy to find a brand new sealed eye shadow pallet wrapped in a lot of bubble wrap. The eye shadow itself goes on very smooth and you only need one-two applications to make it bold. A good product. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what is pictured but still gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: So the bad first. Shippers should know by now to bubble wrap the hell out of shadows! I once again had to get a replacement because the first one was abox of dust. Secondly the colors are not what is pictured. The only place I saw the true colors I received was in the video. It's actually a mix of matte and metallics. I've included a picture. The only reason it's 4 stars and not 5. However they are nice colors, and the pigment is strong. The powder sticks very well and lasts all day. I actually love it and have been using it everyday since.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Himan

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality eye shadow. It doesn't stay on well for any significant period of time. And the color that looks purple isn't purple at all. I'm going to have to try some more expensive and, hopefully, better quality eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Love these colors!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Covergirl eyeshadow palettes. For background, I have pretty dry skin and don’t have very oily eye lids, so someone with oily skin may not have as good of an experience. But personally, I love the pigmentation of these palettes (I have 4 of varying shades) they blend fairly well, and last all day as long as you don’t touch your eyes too much. I love them for me!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!  Just don't
customer_reviews.text: The rose palette colors are just okay. I really only like about three in the set. But, the real problem is the eyeshadow is extremely powdery and when using a brush or sponge applicator the shadow sort of flies of the brush and in the air and it's messy to apply to my eyelids, and gets inside my eyes. So, not worth it. I just threw it away!
customer_reviews.author: goldilvr

customer_reviews.title: Great eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: I love these colors and have received many compliments. They brighten up my blue/grey eyes. The colors are a bit light though. Also, sparkly shadow tends to irritate my eyes. This doesn't. There are sparkly and matte colors.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf5

customer_reviews.title: Complimentary Colors -Rose
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and decent amount of eyeshadow. I really love this eyeshadow and will buy again. The only drawback is it isn’t very thick so it takes a lot to show up. I got the roses palette (I’m a redhead) and it’s very complimentary . It’s also very gentle on my fair skin & I don’t have any itching or reactions like I do with some makeup.
customer_reviews.author: from50613

customer_reviews.title: Great colors. Bad formula.
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. But the fallout is crazy. Everything turns to mud. Looks like I took ash and threw some glitter on it. No blending possible. I know these are tricky colors to begin with. But when you're experienced and you still can't get a mid range blend , ugh, the formula and fallout give this palette a failing grade.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette M Conway

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase for
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a cracked lid but the eye shadow was fine. The colors are exactly as seen here. I feel this would be fine for beginners or experienced women. The cracked lid was just a fluke, I’m sure, and wouldn’t prevent me from ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: rodrisme

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful eye shadow!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors in this set & the fact they stay on. Blending is easy & there is a lot of pigment! Shimmer is in five of the color with three being mainly matte with a frost feel. Definitely will get another color set the next time. According to their website COVERGIRL products are certified cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: christagayle

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors! Easy to apply, and a little goes a long way. I may not ever use the darkest color. I love the shades offered here. The eye shadow lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Really pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! The pigment is great, it goes on super vibrant and exactly like it is in the palette. I used to use the Wet n Wild ones but they discontinued them, I'm glad I found this one. I only wish there were more browns in this palette, it's all so purple/pink that there isn't a good contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & TierneyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love this color palette for traveling because I can take this one palette and have a range from neutral to rosy to smokey eyes with very little effort. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: kimmer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price and colors.
customer_reviews.text: Colors are fine. But as you can see first line was broken. Seems a bit too soft. So shipping in a soft bag didn’t help either.
customer_reviews.author: collect00

customer_reviews.title: ... Started Getting into makeup again and this was the perfect palette! I love all the combination possibilities
customer_reviews.text: I recently Started Getting into makeup again and this was the perfect palette! I love all the combination possibilities! The colors to on smooth and not cakey. It makes learning to do make up fun!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua kerr

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your makeup drawer!! Pink shimmer perfection.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pallet. Pink looks best on my eyes and the shimmer is stand out. I always get compliments on my makeup and I don't spend a fortune. Good quality and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nowak

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL truNAKED Eyeshadow Palette, Nudes 805, 0.23 ounce (Packaging May Vary), Pack of 1
product_meta.description:
Color:Nudes - 805| Size:Pack of 1This eye shadow palette has a stunning range of neutral shades for your perfect nude eye look. Richly pigmented shadows in nudes, and in a range of colors and textures from neutrals to smokys and shimmers to mattes.

BRAND STORY
By CoverGirl
feature_bullets: COVERGIRL truNAKED Eyeshadow Palette, Nudes 805 (Packaging May Vary)

Express your unique style with COVERGIRL eyeshadow palettes. From subtle daytime looks to dramatic, smoky evening styles, our eyeshadow palettes and kits. Complete your eye look with COVERGIRL LashBlast Volume and truNaked Waterproof Eyeliner Duo.

Whether you are going for a classic look that's the foundation of your style, trying an advanced technique, looking for a skin treatment or just to treat your skin, COVERGIRL makeup has the professional quality makeup to enhance your natural radiance.

COVERGIRL makeup gives you the makeup you need to be who you are. Fill your makeup bag with COVERGIRL products for eyes, lips, and face. COVERGIRL makeup helps you achieve the perfect brows, lashes, lips and contouring to show off your individual style!

COVERGIRL has your makeup needs covered with a wide range of makeup products for eyes that pop, glossier lips, a flawless foundation. Whatever your beauty needs may be, there's a COVERGIRL product for every style & look. COVERGIRL: I am what I make up.
